function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of outdoor air circulation and constant air movement","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to follow additional protective measures such as wearing masks, gloves, and practicing physical distancing","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extended short-range aerosol transmission of the virus in crowded and poorly ventilated enclosures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate regarding transmission of small airborne aerosols through ventilation systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Aerosol transmission of sars-cov-2 through hvac system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Short-range aerosol transmission due to low ventilation rate","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contamination and spread in indoor dining settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Debate about the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing the transmission of sars-cov-2","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent understanding of the role of aerosol airborne transmission in the spread of sars-cov-2","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential negligence in addressing airborne transmission risks due to conflicting expert opinions","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to inadequate ventilation and air filtration.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential leakage of exhaust air back into the air supply due to energy recovery ventilation systems.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited registered products for sanitizing ductwork, especially for fiber glass duct board or fiber glass lined ducts","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of dissemination of infectious aerosols in buildings","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 and other contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insulation harboring microbiological growths due to lack of maintenance","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertain safety and effectiveness of sealants for duct surfaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for contaminants to enter the space during cleaning","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor maintenance of insulation leading to iaq issues","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Microbiological growth in insulation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupants not feeling comfortable or feeling ill in the building","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to meet cleaning standards for hvac systems","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with state regulations for air duct cleaners","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of regular cleaning and maintenance of hvac systems can lead to the buildup of dirt, mold, and other contaminants, increasing the risk of spreading contagious diseases through the air.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate handling of dirty filters during replacement can lead to the spread of biologic particles, including molds, bacteria, and viruses, posing a risk of contamination to individuals involved in maintenance activities.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reentrainment of exhausted effluents into the hvac system due to engineering problems can result in the spread of contaminants and increase the risk of airborne transmission of diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air flow may result in poor indoor air quality and contribute to the spread of airborne diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of odors in the building may indicate the presence of unsanitary conditions or mold growth, which can contribute to the spread of diseases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclean or inadequate maintenance of ventilation systems can lead to reduced system efficiency and accumulation of contaminants, contributing to indoor air pollution.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper hvac system maintenance and operation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate control of hvac system fan","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper indoor temperature range in hvac system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hvac filter efficiency and capacity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper filter use in older home furnaces","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2contaminated aerosols","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious individuals or frequent sneezing in a space","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in nonmedical settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate natural ventilation may limit the dilution of indoor air and increase the risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate mechanical ventilation systems may fail to regulate good indoor air quality and control infection transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding and guidance on ventilation systems in the context of covid-19 and infectious disease outbreaks","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of focus on ventilation in nonmedical settings","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of the importance of ventilation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on lower cost natural ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 virus in medical settings due to aerosol-generating procedures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in healthcare settings leading to increased risk of infection transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific guidance on proper ventilation rates in nonmedical settings for reducing infection transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respiratory droplet transmission of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fomite transmission of sars-cov-2 virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty about the contribution of small respirable particles to close proximity transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 and other infectious diseases through aerosols and contaminated surfaces in indoor spaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
